You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesE E] > &edot;

== Value ==

There are 3 variations of this entity:

  * `&Edot;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0116/index.htm U+00116].
  * `&eDot;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2251/index.htm U+02251].
  * `&edot;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0117/index.htm U+00117].
